titleStmt.title: SII 7.551: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 551. (A.R. No. 325 of 1901). ON THE WEST AND SOUTH WALLS OF THE TRITALISVARA TEMPLE AT AMMUNDI, GUDIYATTAM TALUK, NORTH ARCOT DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻ cūḻnta puṇari yakaḻ cūḻnta puviyiṟ ponnemi yaḷavum taṉnemi naṭappa viḷaṅku cayamakaḷai Iḷaṅkopparuvattuc cakkarakoṭṭattu vikkiramattoḻilāṟ putumaṇam puṇarntu matuvaiyariṭṭam vayirākarat
ntaḷavaraicar tantaḷam Iriya vāḷuṟai kaḻittut toḷvali kāṭṭip porppari naṭārttik kirttiyai niṟutti vaṭaticai vākai cūṭit teṉṟicait temarukamalap pūmakaḷ potumaiyum ponniyāṭai
yārun tavira vantuyarvuṭa niruppaṟ ṟirumaṇimakuṭam muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭit tannaṭi Iraṇṭu n=taṭamuṭiyākattoṉṉilaven=tar cūṭa muṉṉai maṉuvāṟu peruka kaliyāṟu vaṟuppac ceṅkol ticaitoṟuñ cella ve
Eṅkaṇun taṉātu tirunila veṇṇilāt tikaḻa Orutaṉimeruviṟ puli viḷaiyāṭa vārkaṭaṟ ṟivān=tarattup pūpālar tiṟai viṭutta katañcori kaḷuṟu muṟaimaiyil niṟpa vilaṅkiya teṉṉavaṉ karun=talai parun=talaittiṭat taṉ
ppa Iṉṉāṭ piṟkulappiṟaipol muṟpiḻaiyeneṉuñ colletiṟ koṭiṟṟallatu tan kaivil letirkoṭṭaāttu vikkalaṉ kallatar naṅkilituṭaṅki maṇalūr naṭuvenat tuṅkapattiraiyaḷavum tu
ḷiṟum viṭṭa taṉ māṉamum kūṟiṉa viramuṅ kiṭappa Eṟiṉa malaikaḷu mutuku neḷippa Iḻin=ta natikaḷuñ cuḻaṉ ṟuṭaintoṭa viḻunta kuṭakarun talaivirit talamarat taṉṉāḷukan=tu tānun tāṉaiyu paṉnāḷiṭṭa
mutukum payat tetirmāṟac ceyapperun tiruvum paḻiyukan=tu kuṭutta pukaḻuñ celvamum vaḷarppa maṭan=taya riṭṭamum miṭṭi kuṭutta veṅkari niraiyum kaṅkamaṇ
meṉnum paraṇiIraṇṭum Oruvicai kaikkoṇṭu pukaḻoṭum pāṇṭimaṇṭala n=tiruvuḷattaṭaittu veḷḷvaru parit taraṅkamum tantiravāriyumuṭaittāy vantu
vaṭakaṭal teṉkaṭal paṭarvatupolat tāṅkarum peruñceṉaiyai yevip pañcava raivarum poruta porkkaḷat tañci verukaneḷit toṭi maṟṟavartammai va
nacarar tiriyuṅ koṟṟa ventaṟai veñcurat teṟṟi vicaiyajayastampam ticai muttin calāpamum muttamiḻp potiyalum kanniyum kaikkoṇṭa
laṅkalum poṟiyappār
mevalar vaṇaṅka viṟṟirun=taruḷiya kovirājakeśaripanmarāna cakravatti śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 4Āvatu
jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu paṅkaḷanāṭṭu vaṭakkil vakai miykaṟaināṭṭu Aim
pūṇṭi Ūrom Eṅkaḷūr muppaṉaiyiśvaramuṭaiya mahādevaṟku tirunan=tavaṉamāka Ā
titāsaṉ caṇṭeśvaradevar śrīhastattile nāṅkaḷ nirvārttuk kuṭutta nilamāva
tu teṉpāṟkellai nam kayattukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai tompanmāvukkuk kiḻakkum
vaṭapāṟkellai vaḻikkut teṟkum kīḻpāṟkellai veḷaimeṭṭukkup puku

app.note: Read ticaitoṟum Eḻilpeṟa niṟutti as in other inscriptions

div.p: Partially published in the South-Indian Inscriptions, Vol. I, p. 135f. Nos. 130 and 131.
Digital edition of SII 7.551 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
